ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 25 Oct 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> But what explains this?
> Sitting in Crushbone, not singing, not fighting, just watching, "An orc
> oracle begins to cast a spell. You feel drowsy."
> In the middle of combat with a whole other party! That's Bard Hate.

My guess is there's also some form of zone-wide hatred
accumulator. If you've been sitting in Oasis killing orcs for
10 hours, and someone next to you just zoned in and started
killing orcs, if an unengaged orc sees both of you, it will
prefer to target the person who has been killing stuff there
longer.
--
